item.title: 摩根大通在内幕交易案中限制对 Segantii 的风险敞口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is limiting dealings with Simon Sadler’s Segantii Capital Management Ltd., the Asian hedge fund giant charged with insider trading by authorities in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国海亮计划在摩洛哥建铜厂以开发西方用户
item.description: 浙江海亮股份有限公司是铜管和铜杆的主要生产商，该公司计划斥资 2.88 亿美元在摩洛哥建厂，生产包括锂电池箔在内的新能源材料，以满足全球日益增长的需求。【原文：Zhejiang Hailiang Co., a major producer of copper tubes and rods, plans to build a plant in Morocco for $288 million that manufactures new energy materials, including lithium-battery foil, to tap rising demand around the world.】

item.title: 惠誉预计印度卢比将因债券流入而反弹至 1 美元兑 82 卢比
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，外国资金可能大量流入印度债券，这将有助于卢比从历史低点附近回升，但印度央行可能会限制涨幅。【原文：The potential big foreign inflows into Indian bonds will help the rupee recover from near a record low, but the nation’s central bank is likely to limit the extent of gains, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 中国激增的工业贷款流向了错误的地方
item.description: 随着中国的工业产能成为一个关键的贸易问题，中国银行对该行业的贷款激增经常被作为中国政府正在重新推动制造业发展的证据，这可能会使廉价商品充斥全球市场。【原文：As China’s industrial capacity emerged as a key trade issue, a surge in Chinese bank loans to the sector has often been cited as evidence that Beijing is engaging in a renewed manufacturing push that could flood global markets with cheap goods.】

item.title: 利率走向不明，台湾债券交易量放缓
item.description: 在利率前景不明朗的情况下，台湾的债券交易员最近并不热心。【原文：Bond traders in Taiwan aren’t an enthused lot these days amid uncertainty over the outlook for interest rates.】

item.title: 中国政策性银行偿还中国人民银行的速度创下新高，转而购买债券
item.description: 随着中国债券市场的强劲反弹，中国所谓的政策性银行正在放弃将中国人民银行作为资金来源，转而急于举债。【原文：As the Chinese bond market undergoes a powerful rally, the nation’s so-called policy banks are turning away from the People’s Bank of China as a source of funding and rushing to raise debt instead.】

item.title: 瑞银任命三位新的澳大利亚和新西兰债务主管
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）为其在澳大利亚和新西兰的债务资本市场业务任命了一系列领导层，以拓展该业务在全球的发展。【原文：UBS Group AG has made a slew of leadership appointments for its debt capital markets business in Australia and New Zealand as it expands that business around the world.】

item.title: KKR 将以 14 亿美元收购澳大利亚 Perpetual 公司的两个股份
item.description: 澳大利亚基金管理公司 Perpetual Ltd.同意与私募股权公司 KKR & Co.达成协议，以 21.75 亿澳元（14.3 亿美元）的价格出售其财富管理和企业信托部门。【原文：Australian funds manager Perpetual Ltd. agreed to a deal with private equity firm KKR & Co. for a sale of its wealth management and corporate trust units for A$2.175 billion ($1.43 billion).】

item.title: 摩根士丹利策略师警告不要追逐中国股市涨幅
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，中国股市是全球最大的股市之一，其上涨势头可能会减弱。【原文：The momentum behind one of the world’s biggest stock rallies in China will likely abate, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: Olam Agri击败路易达孚竞购棉花生产商Namoi
item.description: Olam Agri Holdings Ltd. 又一次击败了路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.【原文：Olam Agri Holdings Ltd. has yet again trumped Louis Dreyfus Co.’s bid for Namoi Cotton Ltd., as the two major agricultural traders vie for the Australian cotton producer.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市反弹正处于十字路口。习近平抵达塞尔维亚。TikTok 起诉美国政府。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US equity rebound is at a crossroads. Xi Jinping arrives in Serbia. TikTok sues the US government. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中东局势和库存成为关注焦点，石油价格窄幅波动
item.description: 由于交易商关注中东的紧张局势和一份温和看跌的美国库存报告，原油在 3 月中旬以来的最低水平附近持稳。【原文：Oil was steady near the the lowest level since mid-March as traders tracked tensions in the Middle East and a mildly bearish US stockpiles report.】

item.title: 姆努钦称强势美元暂时有助于美国债务融资
item.description: 美国前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）表示，强势美元是帮助美国暂时为巨额财政赤字融资的一个优势，但他呼吁 11 月总统大选的获胜者领导一项控制联邦债务负担的新举措。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said a strong dollar is an advantage in helping the US to finance large fiscal deficits for now, but called on the winner of November’s presidential election to lead a new initiative to rein in the federal debt burden.】

item.title: 大华银行利润超出预期，财富管理费缓解贷款放缓压力
item.description: 大华银行（United Overseas Bank Ltd.）第一季度利润高于预期，原因是财富管理和银行卡费用的增长缓解了贷款收入的轻微下滑。【原文：United Overseas Bank Ltd. first-quarter profit came in above estimates as gains in wealth and card fees cushioned a slight drop in lending income.】

item.title: Blackstone 和喜达屋就商业地产市场风险意见不一
item.description: 全球最大的两位房地产投资者对美国商业地产周期的现状看法不一。【原文：Two of the world’s biggest property investors are split on the current state of the US commercial real estate cycle.】

item.title: 美国股市反弹乏力，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一：市场综述
item.description: 继美国股市低迷之后，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，投资者对市场能否在经济横流的情况下维持本月的涨势看法不一。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for a mixed open following a sluggish US session, with investors split on whether the market can sustain this month’s rally given economic crosscurrents.】

item.title: 基金品牌重塑后，AQR 的多策略交易获得 13.5% 的收益
item.description: AQR 资本管理有限责任公司（AQR Capital Management LLC）在热闹的多策略投资领域崭露头角，今年截至 4 月份，其发行的 12 亿美元 Apex 基金取得了 13.5% 的收益。【原文：AQR Capital Management LLC is making its mark in the buzzy world of multistrategy investing, notching a 13.5% gain this year through April in its $1.2 billion Apex offering.】

item.title: 做空债券的赌注被取消后，交易员在权衡下一步行动
item.description: 由于美联储今年的政策走向仍有很大争议，利率交易员们不敢下大赌注。【原文：Rate traders are hanging back from making big bets with the Federal Reserve’s policy path for this year very much up for debate.】

item.title: 费森尤斯上调业绩预测，确认退出 Vamed 业务的计划
item.description: 费森尤斯公司（Fresenius SE）基于对静脉注射药物的强劲需求上调了预期，并确认了退出其最小业务部门 Vamed 的计划。【原文：Fresenius SE raised its forecast based on strong demand for intravenous drugs and confirmed plans to exit Vamed, its smallest business unit.】

item.title: 美国大选风险开始在外汇市场显现
item.description: 尽管距离 11 月 5 日美国大选还有近六个月的时间，但货币市场已开始围绕美国 11 月 5 日大选的外汇波动进行定价。【原文：Currency markets have started pricing in elevated foreign exchange volatility around the US vote on Nov. 5, even with election day almost six months away.】

item.title: 巴利亚斯尼公司正在欧洲建立天然气和电力实体业务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Balyasny 资产管理公司正在丹麦设立一个天然气和电力实物交易部门，以期从其不断增长的大宗商品业务中获取更多利润。【原文：Balyasny Asset Management is setting up a unit to trade physical natural gas and power in Denmark in a bid to generate more profit from its growing commodities business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 墨西哥研究在下半年出售武士债券
item.description: 墨西哥财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）表示，墨西哥正在权衡下半年重返日元债务市场的可能性。【原文：Mexico is weighing a return to yen debt markets in the second half of the year, according to Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio.】

item.title: 古根海姆衡量贷款人对梅西百货收购融资的兴趣
item.description: 古根海姆合伙公司（Guggenheim Partners）正在与包括私人信贷公司在内的贷款机构洽谈，以了解他们对投资公司 Arkhouse Management Co. 和 Brigade Capital Management 可能以 66 亿美元收购美国连锁百货公司梅西百货（Macy's Inc.【原文：Guggenheim Partners is talking to lenders, including private credit firms, to gauge their interest in financing the potential $6.6 billion buyout of US department store chain Macy’s Inc. by investment firms Arkhouse Management Co. and Brigade Capital Management.】

item.title: 拜登重启美国战略石油储备填充计划
item.description: 拜登政府正利用油价下跌的机会重新启动计划，以补充其枯竭的紧急石油储备。【原文：The Biden administration is taking advantage of a dip in oil prices to restart plans to refill its depleted emergency oil cache.】

item.title: 象牙海岸称可支付部分延迟可可合同的费用
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，象牙海岸表示，它可以补偿可可出口商已展期的合同，但不能补偿托运人所要求的全部吨位。【原文：Ivory Coast said it can compensate cocoa exporters for contracts that were rolled over, but not for the full tonnage that shippers are seeking, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦计划制定强制执行 ZiG 汇率的规则
item.description: 津巴布韦计划出台新规定，强制企业在为商品和服务定价时只能使用其黄金支持货币 ZiG 的官方汇率。【原文：Zimbabwe plans new rules to compel businesses to only use the official exchange rate of its gold-backed currency, the ZiG, when pricing goods and services.】

item.title: 人工智能对金融稳定的风险已成为央行的担忧
item.description: 两位央行行长周二在一次会议上表示，人工智能工具的发展对金融稳定造成的危险已经开始令人担忧。【原文：Dangers to financial stability posed by the development of artificial intelligence tools are already starting to become a worry, two central bank chiefs told a conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛称美国企业将挽救股市涨势
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The biggest buyers of US equities, American companies, are back in the market and ready to drive the next leg of the stock market rally, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称结构性因素可能使通胀持续走高
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，包括地缘政治和去碳化在内的各种力量可能会在未来几年保持消费价格的高增长。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said forces including geopolitics and decarbonization could keep consumer-price growth elevated in the years ahead.】

item.title: 摩根大通说明为何美国的违约率不那么令投资者担忧
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Nelson Jantzen has a calming notion for investors alarmed by the US corporate default rate rising to almost 6% by one calculation.】
